intro:
The forest is peaceful
 as you stride through,

On a journey
 of your own,

lost in a sea
 of thoughts.

All of a sudden,
 you come across a
 discarded journal.

You notice it's
 covered in dirt and
 looks quite old.

The front cover reads:
 Talo's Quests!

intro2:
This kid went to
 find his older brother.

Maybe if you try the
 things he wrote about,

Not because you care.
 Just to make sure he's
 not lost
